data.name: Age of Irata
data.detailed_description:
A federation of hostile species across the universe is growing.

Without a moments notice, the situation went from under control to outright chaos.

You are the last remaining that has the potential to bring peace to the universe but were shot out of the sky. whispers of your return have faded and hope is dwindling...

It is up to you to bring yourself back to a state of strength to bring order back to the lives of billons of helpless species.


You will be forced to traverse and explore multiple planets in this open world Metroidvania.

- Repair your ship.

- Obtain power increases and abilities along your way

​

The lives of billions depend on you.
data.about_the_game:
A federation of hostile species across the universe is growing.

Without a moments notice, the situation went from under control to outright chaos.

data.short_description: A retro styled sci-fi metroidvania without the technical limitations. Dash, jump, roll, swing, and shoot your way back through 5 planets in this open styled exploration adventure in all of its pixel art glory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: The system requirements will change as the game moves further into development.
